taxgroup.default: select tx.rate_value*100 as taxcode, round(sum(ti.net_amount),cu.digit) as netamount, round(sum(ti.vat_amount),cu.digit) as vatamount, round(sum(ti.amount),cu.digit) as amount from item_view ti inner join trans t on t.code = ti.trans_code  inner join currency_view cu on cu.code = t.currency_code inner join product p on p.code = ti.product_code inner join tax_view tx on tx.code = ti.tax_code where ti.trans_code = @code group by tx.rate_value, tx.code, cu.digit order by tx.rate_value
taxgroup.postgres: select tx.rate_value*100 as taxcode, round(sum(ti.net_amount)::numeric,cu.digit) as netamount, round(sum(ti.vat_amount)::numeric,cu.digit) as vatamount, round(sum(ti.amount)::numeric,cu.digit) as amount from item_view ti inner join trans t on t.code = ti.trans_code  inner join currency_view cu on cu.code = t.currency_code inner join product p on p.code = ti.product_code inner join tax_view tx on tx.code = ti.tax_code where ti.trans_code = @code group by tx.rate_value, tx.code, cu.digit order by tx.rate_value

items.default: select concat(case when ti.deposit=true then '={{lb_deposit}}: ' else '' end, ti.description) as description , ti.product_code as partnumber, ti.unit as unit, ti.qty as qty, tx.rate_value*100 as taxcode, ti.fx_price as fxprice, ti.net_amount as netamount, ti.discount as discount, ti.vat_amount as vatamount, ti.amount as amount, ti.deposit as deposit from item_view ti inner join tax_view tx on tx.code = ti.tax_code where ti.trans_code = @code order by ti.id
items.sqlite: select case when ti.deposit=true then '={{lb_deposit}}: ' else '' end || ti.description as description , ti.product_code as partnumber, ti.unit as unit, ti.qty as qty, tx.rate_value*100 as taxcode, ti.fx_price as fxprice, ti.net_amount as netamount, ti.discount as discount, ti.vat_amount as vatamount, ti.amount as amount, ti.deposit as deposit from item_view ti inner join tax_view tx on tx.code = ti.tax_code where ti.trans_code = @code order by ti.id
items.mssql: select case when ti.deposit=true then '={{lb_deposit}}: ' else '' end + ti.description as description , ti.product_code as partnumber, ti.unit as unit, ti.qty as qty, tx.rate_value*100 as taxcode, ti.fx_price as fxprice, ti.net_amount as netamount, ti.discount as discount, ti.vat_amount as vatamount, ti.amount as amount, ti.deposit as deposit from item_view ti inner join tax_view tx on tx.code = ti.tax_code where ti.trans_code = @code order by ti.id

head.default: select t.code as transnumber, substr(cast(t.time_stamp as char(10)), 1, 10) as crdate, t.trans_date as transdate, case when t.notes is null then '' else t.notes end as notes, case when t.report_notes is null then '' else t.report_notes end as fnote, case when (t.status != 'STATUS_NORMAL' ) then case when t.trans_code is null then '' else concat('={{lb_ref_invoice}}: ', t.trans_code) end else '' end as ref_transnumber_1, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_NORMAL' ) then case when t.trans_code is null then '' else t.trans_code end else '' end as ref_transnumber_2, case when t.closed = true then '={{lb_copy}}' else '={{lb_original_issue}}' end as state, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_CANCELLATION' ) then '={{lb_cancelling_invoice}}' when (t.status = 'STATUS_AMENDMENT') then '={{lb_amending_invoice}}' else '' end as transcast, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_DELETED') then '={{lb_deleted}}' else '' end as status, substr(cast(t.due_time as char(10)), 1, 10) as duedate , t.currency_code as curr, cu.description as currname, case when t.paid_type = 'PAID_TRANSFER' then '={{lb_paid_transfer}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_CARD' then '={{lb_paid_card}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_ONLINE' then '={{lb_paid_online}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_CASH' then '={{lb_paid_cash}}' else '={{lb_paid_other}}' end as paidtypedesc, t.rate as acrate, t.invoice_company_name as comp_name , concat('={{lb_address}}: ',case when t.invoice_company_address is null then '' else t.invoice_company_address end) as comp_address, concat('={{lb_tax_no}}: ',case when t.invoice_company_tax_number is null then '' else t.invoice_company_tax_number end) as comp_taxnumber, t.invoice_customer_name as cust_name , concat('={{lb_address}}: ', case when t.invoice_customer_address is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_address end) as cust_address, concat('={{lb_tax_no}}: ',case when t.invoice_customer_tax_number is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_tax_number end) as cust_taxnumber, concat('={{lb_account_no}}: ',case when t.invoice_customer_account is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_account end) as custaccount, concat('={{lb_account_no}}: ',case when t.invoice_company_account is null then '' else t.invoice_company_account end) as compaccount, tsum.sum_netamount as sum_netamount, tsum.sum_vatamount as sum_vatamount, tsum.sum_amount as sum_amount from trans_view t inner join currency_view cu on t.currency_code = cu.code left join (select ti.trans_code as code, round(sum(ti.net_amount),cu.digit) as sum_netamount, round(sum(ti.vat_amount),cu.digit) as sum_vatamount, round(sum(ti.amount),cu.digit) as sum_amount from item_view ti inner join trans t on t.code = ti.trans_code inner join currency_view cu on cu.code = t.currency_code group by ti.trans_code, cu.digit) as tsum on tsum.code = t.code where t.code = @code
head.postgres: select t.code as transnumber, substr(cast(t.time_stamp as char(10)), 1, 10) as crdate, t.trans_date as transdate, case when t.notes is null then '' else t.notes end as notes, case when t.report_notes is null then '' else t.report_notes end as fnote, case when (t.status != 'STATUS_NORMAL' ) then case when t.trans_code is null then '' else concat('={{lb_ref_invoice}}: ', t.trans_code) end else '' end as ref_transnumber_1, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_NORMAL' ) then case when t.trans_code is null then '' else t.trans_code end else '' end as ref_transnumber_2, case when t.closed = true then '={{lb_copy}}' else '={{lb_original_issue}}' end as state, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_CANCELLATION' ) then '={{lb_cancelling_invoice}}' when (t.status = 'STATUS_AMENDMENT') then '={{lb_amending_invoice}}' else '' end as transcast, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_DELETED') then '={{lb_deleted}}' else '' end as status, substr(cast(t.due_time as char(10)), 1, 10) as duedate , t.currency_code as curr, cu.description as currname, case when t.paid_type = 'PAID_TRANSFER' then '={{lb_paid_transfer}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_CARD' then '={{lb_paid_card}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_ONLINE' then '={{lb_paid_online}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_CASH' then '={{lb_paid_cash}}' else '={{lb_paid_other}}' end as paidtypedesc, t.rate as acrate, t.invoice_company_name as comp_name , concat('={{lb_address}}: ',case when t.invoice_company_address is null then '' else t.invoice_company_address end) as comp_address, concat('={{lb_tax_no}}: ',case when t.invoice_company_tax_number is null then '' else t.invoice_company_tax_number end) as comp_taxnumber, t.invoice_customer_name as cust_name , concat('={{lb_address}}: ', case when t.invoice_customer_address is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_address end) as cust_address, concat('={{lb_tax_no}}: ',case when t.invoice_customer_tax_number is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_tax_number end) as cust_taxnumber, concat('={{lb_account_no}}: ',case when t.invoice_customer_account is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_account end) as custaccount, concat('={{lb_account_no}}: ',case when t.invoice_company_account is null then '' else t.invoice_company_account end) as compaccount, tsum.sum_netamount as sum_netamount, tsum.sum_vatamount as sum_vatamount, tsum.sum_amount as sum_amount from trans_view t inner join currency_view cu on t.currency_code = cu.code left join (select ti.trans_code as code, round(sum(ti.net_amount)::numeric,cu.digit) as sum_netamount, round(sum(ti.vat_amount)::numeric,cu.digit) as sum_vatamount, round(sum(ti.amount)::numeric,cu.digit) as sum_amount from item_view ti inner join trans t on t.code = ti.trans_code inner join currency_view cu on cu.code = t.currency_code group by ti.trans_code, cu.digit) as tsum on tsum.code = t.code where t.code = @code
head.sqlite: select t.code as transnumber, substr(cast(t.time_stamp as char(10)), 1, 10) as crdate, t.trans_date as transdate, case when t.notes is null then '' else t.notes end as notes, case when t.report_notes is null then '' else t.report_notes end as fnote, case when (t.status != 'STATUS_NORMAL' ) then case when t.trans_code is null then '' else '={{lb_ref_invoice}}: '||t.trans_code end else '' end as ref_transnumber_1, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_NORMAL' ) then case when t.trans_code is null then '' else t.trans_code end else '' end as ref_transnumber_2, case when t.closed = true then '={{lb_copy}}' else '={{lb_original_issue}}' end as state, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_CANCELLATION' ) then '={{lb_cancelling_invoice}}' when (t.status = 'STATUS_AMENDMENT') then '={{lb_amending_invoice}}' else '' end as transcast, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_DELETED') then '={{lb_deleted}}' else '' end as status, substr(cast(t.due_time as char(10)), 1, 10) as duedate , t.currency_code as curr, cu.description as currname, case when t.paid_type = 'PAID_TRANSFER' then '={{lb_paid_transfer}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_CARD' then '={{lb_paid_card}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_ONLINE' then '={{lb_paid_online}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_CASH' then '={{lb_paid_cash}}' else '={{lb_paid_other}}' end as paidtypedesc, t.rate as acrate, t.invoice_company_name as comp_name , '={{lb_address}}: '||case when t.invoice_company_address is null then '' else t.invoice_company_address end as comp_address, '={{lb_tax_no}}: '||case when t.invoice_company_tax_number is null then '' else t.invoice_company_tax_number end as comp_taxnumber, t.invoice_customer_name as cust_name , '={{lb_address}}: '||case when t.invoice_customer_address is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_address end as cust_address, '={{lb_tax_no}}: '||case when t.invoice_customer_tax_number is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_tax_number end as cust_taxnumber, '={{lb_account_no}}: '||case when t.invoice_customer_account is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_account end as custaccount, '={{lb_account_no}}: '||case when t.invoice_company_account is null then '' else t.invoice_company_account end as compaccount, tsum.sum_netamount as sum_netamount, tsum.sum_vatamount as sum_vatamount, tsum.sum_amount as sum_amount from trans_view t inner join currency_view cu on t.currency_code = cu.code left join (select ti.trans_code as code, round(sum(ti.net_amount),cu.digit) as sum_netamount, round(sum(ti.vat_amount),cu.digit) as sum_vatamount, round(sum(ti.amount),cu.digit) as sum_amount from item_view ti inner join trans t on t.code = ti.trans_code inner join currency_view cu on cu.code = t.currency_code group by ti.trans_code, cu.digit) as tsum on tsum.code = t.code where t.code = @code
head.mssql: select t.code as transnumber, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), t.time_stamp, 120) as crdate, t.trans_date as transdate, case when t.notes is null then '' else t.notes end as notes, case when t.report_notes is null then '' else t.report_notes end as fnote, case when (t.status != 'STATUS_NORMAL' ) then case when t.trans_code is null then '' else '={{lb_ref_invoice}}: '+t.trans_code end else '' end as ref_transnumber_1, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_NORMAL' ) then case when t.trans_code is null then '' else t.trans_code end else '' end as ref_transnumber_2, case when t.closed = true then '={{lb_copy}}' else '={{lb_original_issue}}' end as state, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_CANCELLATION' ) then '={{lb_cancelling_invoice}}' when (t.status = 'STATUS_AMENDMENT') then '={{lb_amending_invoice}}' else '' end as transcast, case when (t.status = 'STATUS_DELETED') then '={{lb_deleted}}' else '' end as status, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), t.due_time, 120) as duedate , t.currency_code as curr, cu.description as currname, case when t.paid_type = 'PAID_TRANSFER' then '={{lb_paid_transfer}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_CARD' then '={{lb_paid_card}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_ONLINE' then '={{lb_paid_online}}' when t.paid_type = 'PAID_CASH' then '={{lb_paid_cash}}' else '={{lb_paid_other}}' end as paidtypedesc, t.rate as acrate, t.invoice_company_name as comp_name , '={{lb_address}}: '+case when t.invoice_company_address is null then '' else t.invoice_company_address end as comp_address, '={{lb_tax_no}}: '+case when t.invoice_company_tax_number is null then '' else t.invoice_company_tax_number end as comp_taxnumber, t.invoice_customer_name as cust_name , '={{lb_address}}: '+case when t.invoice_customer_address is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_address end as cust_address, '={{lb_tax_no}}: '+case when t.invoice_customer_tax_number is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_tax_number end as cust_taxnumber, '={{lb_account_no}}: '+case when t.invoice_customer_account is null then '' else t.invoice_customer_account end as custaccount, '={{lb_account_no}}: '+case when t.invoice_company_account is null then '' else t.invoice_company_account end as compaccount, tsum.sum_netamount as sum_netamount, tsum.sum_vatamount as sum_vatamount, tsum.sum_amount as sum_amount from trans_view t inner join currency_view cu on t.currency_code = cu.code left join (select ti.trans_code as code, round(sum(ti.net_amount),cu.digit) as sum_netamount, round(sum(ti.vat_amount),cu.digit) as sum_vatamount, round(sum(ti.amount),cu.digit) as sum_amount from item_view ti inner join trans t on t.code = ti.trans_code inner join currency_view cu on cu.code = t.currency_code group by ti.trans_code, cu.digit) as tsum on tsum.code = t.code where t.code = @code
